translation.click_start: Clicking is initiated {{delay}} times per second!
translation.click_key_expl_text: Presses the selected key or keys at specified millisecond intervals when the application is started
translation.not_admin_text: The application was not run as administrator! This may cause the program not to work in some applications.
translation.delay_error: The click delay can be a minimum of 1 millisecond.
translation.error_occured: An error occurred while starting the action! Error: {{err}}
translation.hold_key_expl_text: When the application is started, it starts pressing the selected key and keeps it pressed until the application is stopped.
translation.hold_start: Started holding down the selected key
